industries.title: Energy
industries.subtitle: Renewable energies are considered a privileged vector in the fight against global warming.
industries.content: In the transportation ecosystem, being a leader means looking forward. At Indra, we are at the heart of our clients’ businesses, working hand-in-hand with them throughout the full project life-cycle, offering comprehensive solutions and added-value services. What sets us apart is our in-depth knowledge of the planning, construction, management and operation of transport services and infrastructures, of all types and in all regions.
